Introduction Heared it right, quiz me, it is a platform where you can invest your knowledge. The education has graced us since it begin. So, if you are a book buff and a craze on it .Now a time come to take it as a challenge .Do you think you know it all? Do you consider yourself an expert in it? Come forward because it is a only platform where you can show how much you know and to prove yourself.
EVENT STRUCTURE 1. Each student will be given set of 30 multiple type questions.
2. +1 marks will be allotted for each correct answer and no negative marking.
3. 10 students will be selected according to minimum time taken.
4. The selected team shall have to appear for the final round.
5. In round 2 ,10 question will be ask in 100 seconds.
6. One who give the maximum correct answer will be consider as winner.
7. If in case same no. of questions attempt correct the master question will be ask.
Rules 1. Starting and ending time of paper should be written carefully.
2. The participants shall not be allowed to use mobile or other electronic instruments.
3. The question shall be in the form of single correct answer.
4. Replacement of any participant is not allow.
5. Students are not allow to flip the front side of sheet till not instructed.
6. The decision of the quiz will not be subjected to change.
